entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued November 06 at 4:06PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Blowing dust health alert in Effect for the Powder River Basin of Northeastern Wyoming in effect from 3 AM to 1 PM MST Monday... The following message is transmitted in collaboration with the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division. * WHAT...Southeast winds of 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Powder River Basin of northeastern Wyoming.
